title: Ghotki incident; Gilani cancels birthday celebrations
content:
MULTAN, Jun 09 (APP):Leader of Opposition in Senate and former Prime Minister, Syed Yusuf Raza Gilani cancelled his 68th birthday celebrations in the wake of train accident at Ghotki.
He called off all of the activities related to his birthday in the city including cutting of cake.
When a large number of party workers reached Gilani’s residence to mark his anniversary, but he refused to celebrate.
” I share the grief of the victims of Ghotki train incident and pray for early recovery of the injured.” said a release issued here on Wednesday.
Meanwhile, a delegation of PMA called on Yusuf Raza Gilani and discussed with him the problems being faced by doctors community.
He assured the delegation for early solution for doctors issues.
